document_data.mainbody:
Chanthalas Ulbright was a human priest of Tymora in Baldurs Gate in the midâ€“14 century DR.
By 1358 DR, Chanthalas was the high priest of the Ladys Hall temple, holding the title of High Priest of the Ladys Favor. He led twenty-four priests and sixty-nine followers by 1367 DR.
